column1: Little Goat Diner////Simply delicious. After waiting for 45 minutes we were seated at the bar
column2: and were promptly served coffee. Everything on the breakfast menu looked fantastic
column3: but the omelet and corned beef hash won. The omelet had great textures and flavors
column4: and for a non deli the corned beef hash was tasty. My favorite was the Stumptown coffee that was served
column5: what a surprise when I realized they had it in Chicago! I would definitely go back. The prices were not absurd for the quality of the food
column6: and it is a fun place to people watch.
